description:
Maximum warmth for cold days, the Kari Traa Rose Pant help you build your defense against heat-sneaking winter. The pure merino fabric is super-fine, soft and offers complete freedom of movement. The knit rose pattern and contrasting seams? Just a nod to their hometown of Trysil, Norway.

  • 240-denier merino wool has 4-way stretch for unrestricted motion
  • Fabric wicks moisture to keep you dry and is naturally antimicrobial for comfort and odour management
  • Elastic waistband for an all-day snug fit
  • High-rise adds coverage
name: Kari Traa Rose High Waist Pants - Women's
